oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mickey Gilley interview - Joe Suglia - 1976-02-12 - WBUK
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Mickey Gilley (performer), conducted by Joe Suglia from February 12, 1976 on radio station WBUK.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Various Mickey Gilley introductions -- Gilley promotes WBUK -- Joe Suglia introduces Mickey Gilley -- Gilley talks about being on tour with Conway Twitty and Loretta Lynn -- Gilley talks about buying Conway Twitty's old bus -- Gilley talks about Overnight Sensation -- Gilley talks about some other songs off the album -- Gilley talks about not liking his song Roll You Like A Wheel -- Gilley talks about not being a good writer -- Gilley talks about continuing what he is already doing -- Joe Suglia thanks Gilley and concludes the interview
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Gilley, Mickey;
